tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to relative path traversal due to improper access control, allowing attackers to read files from unintended directories. This vulnerability occurs because the package fails to properly restrict access to the correct root directory, enabling malicious users to manipulate file paths and gain access to sensitive files outside the intended scope.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `expo-clipboard` library to the patch version.
